DOC.criteria: Primary diagnosis Panic Disorder Subjects 18 60 year age ( inclusive day enrollment ) Subjects Clinician 's Global Impression > = 4 . If psychotropic medication , stable dose minimum 3 month prior enrollment If psychotropic medication , agreement stay stable dose study entry 2month followup .
